channel.title: Specific TOR exit node WHONIX
channel.description: Hello everyone. I'm new to Whonix and and i would like to know how can i select a specific country for tor exit node. I know one way is Vidalia and the other is TORRC file (only found in Gateway). The first one its easier to use (from what i could read...not used yet) but if the second one it's a better option, please let me know how i can achieve my goal. thank you

item.title: Specific TOR exit node WHONIX
item.dc:creator: bubba191
item.description:
Hello everyone. I’m new to Whonix and and i would like to know how can i select a specific country for tor exit node. I know one way is Vidalia and the other is TORRC file (only found in Gateway). The first one its easier to use (from what i could read…not used yet) but if the second one it’s a better option, please let me know how i can achieve my goal. thank you
